profile_desc: Innovative, task-driven professional with 3+ years of experience in web design and development across diverse industries. Equipped with a record of success in consistently identifying and providing the technological needs of companies through ingenious innovation. Proficient in developing databases, creating user interfaces, writing and testing codes, troubleshooting simple/complex issues, and implementing new features based on user feedback. Adept at collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality projects on time and within budget.

education.degree: Master of Science in Oil and Gas Engineering
Bachelor of Engineering in Petrochemical and Polymeric Science

education.school: Sukhothai Thammathirat Open University, Nonthaburi, Thailand
education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

career.description:
• Proactively collaborated with design team and project manager to ensure efficient and timely delivery of projects.
  • Diagnosed and troubleshoot different websites by deploying updated knowledge of modern technologies and techniques.
  • Establish interactive and dynamic websites that guarantee high traffic, page views, and maximum user experience.
  • Translated designs and wireframes into high-quality code using various frameworks.

Primary client projects: Proofpoint, Pinnacle Bank, Alpha & Omega Semiconductor, Upwing Energy, Colorado Department of Human Services
Working with clients on projects related to ReactJS, NextJS and Typescript framework. This includes HTML5, CSS and Vanilla Javascript

• Creating video contents in Chemistry and broadcast on https://www.youtube.com/c/PaulsChemistryThailand
  • Teaching Chemistry for Thai high school students with no costs
  • Creating materials for students to study along with the video
  • Being a part of Youtube Partner Program (YPP)

• Setting up and performing science experiments for students.
  • Communicating between teachers and administrators relating to science experiments
  • Creating online inventories for all equipment
  • Develop the laboratory procedures including health and safety
  • Standardize all measurement tools to ensure their efficiencies
  • Procure the laboratory the equipment required
  • Maintain the condition of the laboratory and equipment
